item.title: CVE-2024-31381|2024-04-15T10:20:14.250Z -- RebelCode -- Spotlight Social Media Feeds
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in RebelCode Spotlight Social Media Feeds.This issue affects Spotlight Social Media Feeds: from n/a through 1.6.10.
